DOC.brief_summary: This Study Will Evaluate Celecoxib Efficacy And Safety Versus Standard Doses Of Diclofenac In Acute Pain Due To Cervical Injury ( Due To A Sprain ) Related To A Motor Vehicle Accident
DOC.brief_title: Celecoxib Efficacy And Safety Versus Diclofenac In Acute Pain Due To Cervical Sprain Related To A Traffic Accident
DOC.detailed_description: On 21Oct2010 study prematurely terminate due poor enrollment subsequent low number participant . No safety efficacy issue involve decision terminate prematurely .
DOC.criteria: Patients That Had Suffered A Car Accident And Due To It Suffered A Cervical Sprain Recent Cervical Sprains Or Other Cervical Conditions
